Articles.Content:
![QxOOy.png](http://i.imgur.com/QxOOy.png)

Basically I was testing a new harrier... It hit the ground...and well that happened.

'Jeb. What did you do, Jeb?'

What were the G-forces to get you to that speed in 8 km?

'Instant orbit; you\'re doing it wrong.'

> 
> 'Jeb. What did you do, Jeb?'
> 
> What were the G-forces to get you to that speed in 8 km?
> 
> 'Instant orbit; you\'re doing it wrong.'

Well, I was testing an engine/RCS mix harrier. Just like the real one, but however, the wings were too far forward, and as soon as it launched, it hit the ground. It survived, but however, it slung so fast that it went THAT fast. And it only went as high as 166 meters.
